NAME: dbRevolver
DESC: A revolver for debugging the game.

NAME: MP Special
DESC: A former Rum-Mon police revolver. It feeds .357 PPC.

NAME: FA Compact
DESC: A small, high-capacity pistol for concealed carry. Chambers .357 PPC-H.

NAME: FA Platinum
DESC: This semiauto recoils tremendously! It fires armour-piercing .41 PAC.

NAME: Charger
DESC: Amihailu’s personal firearm. It chambers .458 Murenbi.

NAME: Varminter 1910
DESC: It’s an accurate little lever-action plinker. Uses .223 Tanunjon.

NAME: Fumihao Frontier
DESC: A Galwi lever-gun pattern from the 1890s. Uses .30-70 Government.

NAME: Fumihao New Army
DESC: It’s one of the more common bolt actions guns. It fires .303.

NAME: Smith’s 2X
DESC: A frighteningly powerful SxS double-rifle. Uses Yalmun Noriko’s .500 handload.
